ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Was this assessment/procedure conducted?
Notes: 0=No; 1=Yes

ElementDescription: Reason assessment not conducted
Notes: 0=Physical Problem; 1=Cognitive/behavioral problem; 2=Verbal refusal; 3=Other problem; 4=Not applicable

ElementDescription: If other problem, describe
Select language version
Notes: 0=English; 1=Spanish

ElementDescription: 1. I speak Spanish
Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=Very little or not very often; 3=Moderately; 4=Much or very often; 5=Extremely often or almost always

Notes: 1=Not at all; 2=Very little or not very often; 3=Moderately; 4=Much or very often; 5=Extremely often or almost always

ElementDescription: Mexican Orientation Scale (MOS)
American Orientation Scale (AOS)
Acculturation Score (AOS-MOS)
Acculturation Level
Notes: 1=Less than -1.33; 2=Greater than or equal to -1.33 and less than or equal to -.07; 2=Greater than -.07 and less than 1.19; 4=Greater than or equal to 1.19 and less than 2.45; 5=Greater than 2.45

ElementDescription: Select the generation that best applies to YOU.
Notes: 1=1st Generation - You were born in Mexico or other; 2=2nd Generation - You were born in USA; either parent born in Mexico or other country; 3=3rd Generation - You were born in USA, both parents born in USA and all grandparents born in Mexico or other country; 4=4th Generation - You and your parents both born in USA and at least one grandparent born in Mexico or other country with remainder born in USA; 5=5th Generation - You and your parents born in the USA and all grandparents born in the USA
